welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cavite City, where the rich history and charming waterfront make for a delightful visit. Known for its historical landmarks and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Café Antix
restaurants.description: Café Antix is a café located in Lungsod ng Kabite.
restaurants.address: P. Burgos Ave. (Corner Cabuco St.), 4100 Lungsod ng Kabite, Cavite

restaurants.name: Flames Burger Haus
restaurants.description: Flames Burger Haus is a burger joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Lungsod ng Kabite.
restaurants.address: J. Felipe Blvd. (at J. Miranda St.), 4100 Lungsod ng Kabite, Cavite

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Lungsod ng Kabite.

restaurants.name: Kainan Sa Balsa
restaurants.description: Kainan Sa Balsa is a filipino restaurant located in Bacoor.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.
